DOC.brief_summary: Research Objectives : This 1-year trial design gather information use Quell person chronic musculoskeletal low back pain . The investigator hypothesize assign use device report reduce back pain compare control condition ; use device also show improvement sleep , mood , level activity . The investigator hypothesize frequency use Quell ( increase tolerability adherence ) correlate great reduction pain . The investigator hypothesize device safe use demonstrate reduction healthcare utilization ( reduce clinic ED visit ) . Finally , base preliminary analysis limit subject number , investigator investigate whether certain individual report great benefit use Quell others , particular , would predict intense long duration pain demonstrate benefit .
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy Quell Wearable Device Chronic Low Back Pain
DOC.criteria: All participant adult age 21 old diagnose axial musculoskeletal back pain without radiculopathy . Patients invited participate smartphone phone ( iPhone Android device ) able download pain app Quell Relief program app onto device . Patients also include : 1. chronic pain > 3 month ' duration 2. average 4 great pain intensity scale 0 10 3. able speak understand English . Patients exclude participation meet follow criterion : 1. diagnosis cancer malignant disease 2. acute osteomyelitis acute bone disease 3. present past DSMV diagnosis schizophrenia , delusional disorder , psychotic disorder , dissociative disorder would judge interfere study participation 4. pregnancy 5. clinically unstable systemic illness judge interfere treatment 6. pain condition require urgent surgery 7. active substance use disorder , cocaine IV heroin use , ( positive Mini International Neuropsychiatric Interview ; M.I.N.I . v.5.0 ) would interfere study participation 8. prescription opioid use pain 9. implanted cardiac pacemaker , defibrillator , implanted device . All subject ask change treatment study period .
